TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed CompilationRelaxations extends System.Enum

summary.para: Indicates whether instruction checking is strictly ordered or relaxed, and whether strings are interned. The flags come in complementary pairs. Setting neither flag of a pair indicates that the corresponding characteristic should be left unchanged. Setting both bits is an error that is detected by the constructor for .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CompilationRelaxations NoStringInterning = int32(8)

summary.para: Indicates that literal strings are not interned; currently only noticed when set for Assemblies.
